boardgame.description: Liar's Dice, a.k.a. Bluff, is a dice game in which each player is given five dice and cup to roll and hide them with. Players make successively higher declarations regarding the results of all the dice remaining in the game, e.g. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;there are ten sixes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. However, someone can always contest the bid. When that happens, all the dice are revealed and either the bidder or the caller loses dice, depending on who was correct. The last player with dice is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a public domain dice game, there are a number of variants or similar games called Liar's Dice. This includes one that is often played with Poker Dice, and differs from the marketed versions in that players only declare on their own hand's value (as opposed to all dice being in play), using poker-hand values._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Original Liars Dice Game Complete Good Condition MB It’s a gutsy game of bids and bluffs! …What’s under those dice cups is anybody’s guess! So the bid gets bigger and the bluffs get bolder—until somebody finally says “NO WAY!” and challenges. The dice are uncovered, the truth is revealed—and whoever guessed wrong loses dice! Contains a betting board, 30 yellow specialty dice, one red specialty die, six dice rolling cups and instructions. Components are in very good condition. Box is worn around edges and corners and rubbed--mostly just normal wear from being in existence--but is intact. No split corners. No tape. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to contact me for a shipping estimate. Buyer pays for 3 pounds shipping weight from 98338, plus 75 cents for delivery confirmation. There is no handling charge. I will ship world-wide. International buyers please contact me for postage information.
Game components in very good condition. Game box has small amount of tape/tape damage at each end. This is the PERUDO edition Shipping to UK destination = £4.50
